channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Integrating CrowdStrike Falcon Fusion SOAR with Cloudflare’s SASE platform】将CrowdStrike Falcon Fusion与Cloudflare的Sase平台集成
item.description: 【 Cloudflare and CrowdStrike have partnered to help SOC teams minimize manual bottlenecks. By combining Cloudflare’s SASE platform with CrowdStrike’s Falcon® Fusion SOAR, security teams can now detect 】Cloudflare和CrowdStrike已合作，帮助SOC团队最大程度地减少手动瓶颈。通过将Cloudflare的Sase平台与CrowdStrike的Falcon®融合Soar相结合，安全团队现在可以检测到

item.title: 【A deep dive into Cloudflare’s September 12, 2025 dashboard and API outage】深入研究Cloudflare的2025年9月12日仪表板和API中断
item.description: 【 Cloudflare’s Dashboard and a set of related APIs were unavailable or partially available for an hour starting on Sep 12, 17:57 UTC. The outage did not affect the serving of cached files via the 】从9月12日，17:57 UTC开始，Cloudflare的仪表板和一组相关的API不可用或部分可用。 中断不会影响通过

item.title: 【Bringing Node.js HTTP servers to Cloudflare Workers】将Node.js HTTP服务器带到Cloudflare工人
item.description: 【 We've implemented the node:http client and server APIs in Cloudflare Workers, allowing developers to migrate existing Node.js applications with minimal code changes. 】我们已经在CloudFlare工人中实现了节点：HTTP客户端和服务器API，使开发人员能够以最小的代码更改迁移现有Node.js应用程序。

item.title: 【Addressing the unauthorized issuance of multiple TLS certificates for 1.1.1.1】解决未经授权的1.1.1.1的多个TLS证书的发行
item.description: 【 Unauthorized TLS certificates were issued for 1.1.1.1 by a Certification Authority without permission from Cloudflare. These rogue certificates have now been revoked. 】未经Cloudflare许可，未经授权的TLS证书以1.1.1.1颁发。这些流氓证书现在已被撤销。

item.title: 【AI Week 2025: Recap】AI周2025年：回顾
item.description: 【 How do we embrace the power of AI without losing control? That was one of our big themes for AI Week 2025. Check out all of the products, partnerships, and features we announced. 】我们如何在不失去控制的情况下拥抱AI的力量？那是我们2025年AI周的大主题之一。查看我们宣布的所有产品，合作伙伴关系和功能。

item.title: 【The impact of the Salesloft Drift breach on Cloudflare and our customers】Salesloft Drift违规对Cloudflare和我们的客户的影响
item.description: 【 An advanced threat actor, GRUB1, exploited the integration between Salesloft’s Drift chat agent and Salesforce to gain unauthorized access to Salesforce tenants of Cloudflare and many other companies. 】一位高级威胁参与者GRUB1利用了Salesloft的漂移聊天代理和Salesforce之间的集成，以获得未经授权的Cloudflare和许多其他公司的Salesforce租户的访问。

item.title: 【Automating threat analysis and response with Cloudy 】自动化威胁分析和多云的响应
item.description: 【 Cloudy now supercharges analytics investigations and Cloudforce One threat intelligence! Get instant insights from threat events and APIs on APTs, DDoS, cybercrime & more - powered by Workers AI. 】Cloudy现在增强了分析调查和Cloudforce一个威胁情报！从威胁事件和API中获得有关APTS，DDOS，Cyber​​Crime等的API的即时见解 - 由工人AI提供支持。

item.title: 【Cloudy Summarizations of Email Detections: Beta Announcement】电子邮件检测的多云汇总：Beta公告
item.description: 【 We're now leveraging our internal LLM, Cloudy, to generate automated summaries within our Email Security product, helping SOC teams better understand what's happening within flagged messages. 】现在，我们利用我们的内部LLM Cloudy来生成我们的电子邮件安全产品中的自动摘要，帮助SOC团队更好地了解标记的消息中正在发生的事情。

item.title: 【Troubleshooting network connectivity and performance with Cloudflare AI】使用CloudFlare AI进行故障排除网络连接和性能
item.description: 【 Troubleshoot network connectivity issues by using Cloudflare AI-Power to quickly self diagnose and resolve WARP client and network issues. 】通过使用CloudFlare AI-Power快速自我诊断并解决翘曲客户端和网络问题来解决网络连接问题。

item.title: 【Cloudflare is the best place to build realtime voice agents】CloudFlare是建造实时语音代理的最佳场所
item.description: 【 Today, we're excited to announce new capabilities that make it easier than ever to build real-time, voice-enabled AI applications on Cloudflare's global network. 】如今，我们很高兴宣布新功能，这些功能比以往任何时候都更容易在Cloudflare的全球网络上构建实时的语音AI应用程序。
